__e: Glen didn't want to get out of prison, and I wanted to know why.
You couldn't get me an in at your shop, could you?
Well, not only that, but Glen was barely ever home.
Uh, we're not IDing Bad Santa, but it turns out that Glen was seen at a computer store here the day he was missing.
I never heard from the woman, but I caught up with Glen later and I made him explain.
We have been at this for hours, Glen, and you still haven't told us anything.
